content.raw: I used the example script in what seemed like the obvious way on a constellation in an attempt to experience the simulated latency and bandwidth restriction.  I captured my terminal output, on both sides.  I was unable to experience any latency or degredation in bandwidth.  If there is something obviously wrong with my command sequence, I'd appreciate the point.
